regen.absent_element: sending a VMEbus reset upon a failed re-sync effort
regen.new_specification: If the re-sync attempt fails, System Initialization shall send a VMEbus reset to address unsynchronized processors.

regen.absent_element: handling failed re-sync by sending a VMEbus reset
regen.new_specification: System Initialization shall send a VMEbus reset if synchronization of any FCP processor fails even after an attempted re-sync.

regen.absent_element: handling failed re-sync by sending a VMEbus reset
regen.new_specification: System Initialization shall send a VMEbus reset if the re-sync attempt fails.

label: If the failed FCP processor has not synced, it shall send a single voted VMEbus reset through the NE to the failed FCP
absence: action of sending a VMEbus reset
